content:
Hi there! I’m a keen naturalist and wildlife photographer.
This blog is my visual journal – a place to share moments captured through my lens and to keep a long-term record of my photographic journey.
My main motivation for starting it was frustration with the ever-changing policies of online photo platforms (looking at you, Flickr and Google Photos!). I wanted a more reliable way to preserve my favorite images online.
Beyond that, I believe keeping a dedicated log of my wildlife encounters is a rewarding practice. Photographs and videos, after all, can’t always capture the full context and memories of those special moments.
And honestly, the idea of having my own little corner of the web with a custom domain? I have to admit, that’s incredibly satisfying!
